channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: AppDynamics vs Splunk in 2025 - What's Changed with Cisco's Acquisition?
item.description: Compare AppDynamics and Splunk APM tools to find the best fit for your organization's needs. Explore features, scalability, pricing, and use cases.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
